name: `Awesome Carnival Slushy Jelly Dessert Drink Maker
name_original: `Awesome Carnival Slushy Jelly Dessert Drink Maker
description:
Make some Slushies at the Carnival!

Features:
- Pour your slushy
- Choose your flavor
- Mix and blend your slushy
- Choose your cup, cap, and straws
- DRINK IT! REFILL IT! DRINK IT AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from: Flavors, cups, caps, decors, stickers and more!!


Download Awesome Carnival Slushy Dessert Drink Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Carnival Slushy Dessert Drink Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
